column2: BRIEF-Teva Pharmaceutical announces pricing of $15 bln of senior notes * Announces pricing of $15 billion of senior notes in connection with pending acquisition of Actavis Generics

DEALTALK-Old pharma sees new profit cure in cancer drugsOld pharma sees new profit cure in cancer drugsDEALTALK-Old pharma sees new profit cure in cancer drugsPatent trial over Amgen's white blood cell drug Neulasta wraps upU.S. FDA knocks back Novartis copy of Amgen's drug NeulastaUPDATE 2-U.S. FDA panel backs Valeant psoriasis drug with risk program July 19 Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc's experimental drug to treat the skin disorder psoriasis should be approved as long as certain measures are put in place to mitigate the risk of suicide
column3: an advisory committee to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration concluded on Tuesday.
